item.title: Cisco's Virtual Teleportation Replaces Airports
item.description:
Star Trek fans have always dreamed of instantly teleporting to any destination. While true teleportation is still science fiction, Cisco’s innovative technology, TelePresence, offers a virtual solution. TelePresence allows users to participate in meetings around the world as if they were physically present. High-definition video, superior audio, and a unique virtual table setup create an incredibly realistic experience, making participants feel like they’re in the same room, even when separated by vast distances...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ciscos-virtual-teleportation-replaces-airports/
